author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: تَزَلْ كُنْتَ مُقْتَدِرًا وَلا تَزالُ تَكُونُ مُهَيْمِنًا لا يَعْزُبُ عَنْ عِلْمِكَ مِنْ شَيْءٍ، وَإِنَّكَ أَنْتَ المُقْتَدِرُ
translation: Thou art He Whose power is from everlasting to everlasting. Nothing escapeth Thy knowledge. Thou art, verily, the God of power, the God of glory and wisdom.
